verses.verse: Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> the plague, <S%H4046><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H5375><s%> a census <S%H7218><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> by their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> is able to go <S%H3318><s%> out to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"[Take a census of the people] from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>" Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who came <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> [were: ]

Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Israel's first-born, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> [of] Hanoch, <S%H2585><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hanochites; <S%H2599><s%> of Pallu, <S%H6396><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Palluites; <S%H6384><s%>
of Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hezronites; <S%H2697><s%> of Carmi, <S%H3756><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Carmites. <S%H3757><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were 43730.
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pallu: <S%H6396><s%> Eliab. <S%H446><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab: <S%H446><s%> Nemuel <S%H5241><s%> and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram. <S%H48><s%> These <S%H1931><s%> are the Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> who <S%H7148><s%> were called <S%H7148><s%> by the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> who <S%H834><s%> contended <S%H5327><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the company <S%H5712><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> when they contended <S%H5327><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%>

and the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed <S%H1104><s%> them up along with Korah, <S%H7141><s%> when that company <S%H5712><s%> died, <S%H4194><s%> when the fire <S%H784><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H250><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> so that they became <S%H1961><s%> a warning. <S%H5251><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> however, did not die. <S%H4191><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Nemuel, <S%H5241><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Nemuelites; <S%H5242><s%> of Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jaminites; <S%H3228><s%> of Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jachinites; <S%H3200><s%>
of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zerahites; <S%H2227><s%> of Shaul, <S%H7586><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shaulites. <S%H7587><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Simeonites, <S%H8099><s%> 22200.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Zephon, <S%H6827><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zephonites; <S%H6831><s%> of Haggi, <S%H2291><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Haggites; <S%H2291><s%> of Shuni, <S%H7764><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shunites; <S%H7765><s%>
of Ozni, <S%H244><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Oznites; <S%H9006><s%> of Eri, <S%H6179><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Erites; <S%H6180><s%>
of Arod, <S%H720><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Arodites; <S%H722><s%> of Areli, <S%H692><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Arelites. <S%H692><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, 40500.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> [were] Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan, <S%H209><s%> but Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were: of Shelah, <S%H7956><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shelanites; <S%H8024><s%> of Perez, <S%H6557><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Perezites; <S%H6558><s%> of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zerahites. <S%H2227><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> were: of Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hezronites; <S%H2697><s%> of Hamul, <S%H2538><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hamulites. <S%H2539><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, 76500.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> [of] Tola, <S%H8439><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Tolaites; <S%H8440><s%> of Puvah, <S%H6312><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Punites; <S%H6324><s%>
of Jashub, <S%H3437><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jashubites; <S%H3432><s%> of Shimron, <S%H9616><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shimronites. <S%H8117><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, 64300.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Sered, <S%H5624><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Seredites; <S%H5625><s%> of Elon, <S%H356><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Elonites; <S%H440><s%> of Jahleel, <S%H3177><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jahleelites. <S%H3178><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Zebulunites <S%H2075><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, 60500.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Machirites; <S%H4354><s%> and Machir <S%H4353><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Gilead: <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gileadites. <S%H1569><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead: <S%H1568><s%> [of] Iezer, <S%H372><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Iezerites; <S%H373><s%> of Helek, <S%H2507><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Helekites; <S%H2516><s%>
and [of] Asriel, <S%H844><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Asrielites; <S%H845><s%> and [of] Shechem, <S%H7928><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shechemites; <S%H7930><s%>
and [of] Shemida, <S%H8061><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shemidaites; <S%H8062><s%> and [of] Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hepherites. <S%H2662><s%>

Now Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> but only <S%H518><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and the names <S%H8034><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> were Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> Noah, <S%H5270><s%> Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were 52700.

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Shuthelah, <S%H7803><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuthelahites; <S%H8364><s%> of Becher, <S%H1071><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Becherites; <S%H1076><s%> of Tahan, <S%H8465><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Tahanites. <S%H8470><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shuthelah: <S%H7803><s%> of Eran, <S%H6197><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Eranites. <S%H6198><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, 32500. These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Bela, <S%H1106><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Belaites; <S%H1108><s%> of Ashbel, <S%H788><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ashbelites; <S%H789><s%> of Ahiram, <S%H297><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ahiramites; <S%H298><s%>
of Shephupham, <S%H8197><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuphamites; <S%H7781><s%> of Hupham, <S%H2349><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Huphamites. <S%H2350><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> were Ard <S%H714><s%> and Naaman: <S%H5283><s%> [of Ard,] the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ardites; <S%H716><s%> of Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Naamites. <S%H5280><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families; <S%H4940><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were 45600.

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Shuham, <S%H7748><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuhamites. <S%H7749><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuhamites, <S%H7749><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, were 64400.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Imnah, <S%H3232><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Imnites; <S%H3232><s%> of Ishvi, <S%H3440><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ishvites; <S%H3441><s%> of Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Beriites. <S%H1284><s%>

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah: <S%H1283><s%> of Heber, <S%H2268><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Heberites; <S%H2277><s%> of Malchiel, <S%H4439><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Malchielites. <S%H4440><s%>
And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> [was] Serah. <S%H8294><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, 53400.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Jahzeel, <S%H3183><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jahzeelites; <S%H3184><s%> of Guni, <S%H1476><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gunites; <S%H1477><s%>
of Jezer, <S%H3337><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jezerites; <S%H3340><s%> of Shillem, <S%H8006><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shillemites. <S%H8016><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families; <S%H4940><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were 45400.
These <S%H428><s%> are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 601730.
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Among these <S%H428><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names. <S%H8034><s%>

"To the larger <S%H7227><s%> [group] you shall increase <S%H7235><s%> their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and to the smaller <S%H4592><s%> [group] you shall diminish <S%H4591><s%> their inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> each <S%H376><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them.

"But the land <S%H776><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> by lot. <S%H1486><s%> They shall receive <S%H5157><s%> their inheritance <S%H5157><s%> according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers.

"According <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6310><s%> to the selection by lot, <S%H1486><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the larger <S%H7227><s%> and the smaller <S%H4592><s%> [groups.]"

And these <S%H428><s%> are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites; <S%H1649><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites; <S%H6956><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Merarites. <S%H4848><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Libnites, <S%H3846><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hebronites, <S%H2276><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mahlites, <S%H4250><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mushites, <S%H4188><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Korahites. <S%H7145><s%> And Kohath <S%H6955><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Amram. <S%H6019><s%>

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> was Jochebed, <S%H3115><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to Levi <S%H3878><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Amram: Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> and their sister <S%H269><s%> Miriam. <S%H4813><s%>
And to Aaron <S%H175><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>
But Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> when they offered <S%H7126><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were 23000, every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> for they were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> to them among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who <S%H834><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

But among these <S%H428><s%> there was not a man <S%H376><s%> of those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who <S%H834><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> of them, "They shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>" And not a man <S%H376><s%> was left <S%H3498><s%> of them, except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
